keyword.name: rand
keyword.desc: Returns a random value between 0 and 1.

keyword.name: rand

param.name: start
param.desc: The start value.

param.name: end
param.desc: The end value.

keyword.desc:
Returns a random value between start and end.
rand(1,10) will create a random value between 1 and 10

keyword.name: move

param.name: x
param.desc: The new x position. (Playfield: 0-640)

param.name: y
param.desc: The new y position. (Playfield: 0-420)

keyword.desc:
Moves an object to a specific position.
The time will be 0.

param.name: time
param.desc: The time in ms at which the movement should take place.

param.desc: The time in ms at which the animation should start.

param.name: endTime
param.desc: The time in ms at which the animation should end.

param.name: endAngle
param.desc: This value will be added to the current angle. (Value in radians, 180 degrees right = 3.1415 (Pi))

keyword.desc: Rotates an object from the current object's angle to a relative angle. Animation will start slow and speed up.

keyword.name: rotateRelSlowDown

param.name: startTime
param.desc: The time in ms at which the animation should start.

param.name: endTime
param.desc: The time in ms at which the animation should end.

param.name: endAngle
param.desc: This value will be added to the current angle. (Value in radians, 180 degrees right = 3.1415 (Pi))

keyword.desc: Rotates an object from the current object's angle to a relative angle. Animation will start fast and slow down.

keyword.name: scaleVec

param.name: xScaling
param.desc: The new x scaling factor. (1 = 100%, 2 = 200%, ...)

param.name: yScaling
param.desc: The new y scaling factor. (1 = 100%, 2 = 200%, ...)

keyword.desc:
Vector-scales an object to a specific scaling factor.
The time will be 0.

keyword.name: Sprite

param.name: imagePath
param.desc: Relative path to the image.

keyword.desc:
Creates a sprite/an image in the storyboard.
layer will be Foreground, and origin will be Centre

keyword.name: Sprite

param.name: imagePath
param.desc: Relative path to the image.

param.name: layer
param.desc: One of the following: Background, Fail, Pass, Foreground

keyword.desc:
Creates a sprite/an image in the storyboard.
origin will be Centre

keyword.name: Sprite

param.name: imagePath
param.desc: Relative path to the image.

param.name: layer
param.desc: One of the following: Background, Fail, Pass, Foreground

param.name: origin
param.desc: One of the following: TopLeft, TopCentre, TopRight, CentreLeft, Centre, CentreRight, BottomLeft, BottomCentre, BottomRight

keyword.desc: Creates a sprite/an image in the storyboard.
